fko.breakout.model

Class LevelLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • fko.breakout.model.LevelLoader

  • public final class LevelLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    LevelLoader

    Loads levels from level text files.

    File format:
    Lines beginning with '#' mark comments and are ignored There must be 18 rows.
    Each row has 11 token.
    Each token has 4 characters and a space in between.
    A token with 'ORNO' represents an empty cell
    A taken with 4 letters represent a brick. The first two letters are from the BrickType.sign and the last two letters represent the fixed power type this brick has. (Usually powers are randomized but this allows for powers to be fixed to certain bricks).

    04.01.2018

      • itemToBrick

        public static Brick itemToBrick(java.lang.String string)
        Converts a string with 4 letters to a Brick instance. "ORNO" or any invalid string return null.
        Otherwise the first two letters represent the BrickType and the last two letters the BrickPowerType.
        Parameters:
        string -
        Returns:
        a Brick instance from the given string. Null if not a valid Brick token.
